title: Centripetal Acceleration
body: Riders in an amusement park ride shaped like a Viking ship hung from a large pivot are rotated back and forth like a rigid pendulum. Sometime near the middle of the ride, the ship is momentarily motionless at the top of its circular arc. the ship then swings down under the influence of gravity. the speed at the bottom of the arc is $$23.4$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$.\n
